<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Dictionary Upgrade (Nov 2021 Release)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryArr = [{
		'query': 'name=sn_shop_sourcing_activity^element=sourcing_close_date',
		'attribute': {
			'column_label': 'Quotes due'
		}
	},
	{
		'query': 'name=sn_shop_attribute_type^element=code',
		'attribute': {
			'internal_type': 'translated_text'
		}
	}	
];
var choiceArr = [
	{
		'query': 'element=object^name=sn_shop_shopnow_content^value=purchase_request_line',
		'attribute': {
            'label': 'Purchase line'
        }
	}
];

dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);
choiceArr.forEach(updateChoice);
updateOpenReleaseRequisition();

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}

function updateOpenReleaseRequisition() {
    
    var reqGr = new PurchaseRequisition().getByQuery("^blanket_requisition.purchase_orderISNOTEMPTY^purchase_order_type=" + PurchaseRequisition.TYPE_STANDARD + "^state!=" + PurchaseRequisition.STATE_CLOSED_CANCELED + "^state!=" + PurchaseRequisition.STATE_CLOSED_REJECTED);
    var ordersIds = {};
    while(reqGr.next()){
          blanketReqOrderId = reqGr.blanket_requisition.purchase_order;
          ordersIds[reqGr.blanket_requisition.purchase_order] = true;    
    }
    var query = "^sys_idIN" + Object.keys(ordersIds).join(',');
    var payload = {};
    payload['open_release_requisition'] = true;
    new PurchaseOrder().updateMultiple(query, payload);
}

function updateChoice(hintObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(hintObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, hintObj.attribute);
}]]></script>
